name: Game Music Creator Sound File
summary: Learn about .GMC files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: GMC files were used to play music in old Commodore Amiga games such as Air Support, Knights of the Sky, Mystical, Stryx, and Miamai Chase. Since Amiga computer systems are rarely used nowadays, GMC files are mainly used to listen to and preserve old music.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
